He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves. That's one theory of author Ken Auletta , author of Googled: The End of the World as We Know It. John C, Dvorak also thinks Eric Schmidt could end up in a role with the Obama administration, one that would be good for tech and policy. See Dvorak; s column on Eric Schmidt 's next act

When I was six weeks pregnant, a doctor at a walk-in clinic prescribed me an antibiotic. It was a holiday, and I couldn't see my regular doctor.
